description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋的原配妻子和皇后，以贤慧、仁慈、节俭著称。在朱元璋早年困难时期给予支持，成为皇后後仍保持简朴，并时常劝谏朱元璋，挽救了多位大臣的性命。死后朱元璋誓言不再立后。
description.en: The primary consort and empress of Zhu Yuanzhang, the Hongwu Emperor of the Ming Dynasty. She was known for her wisdom, kindness, and frugality. She supported Zhu Yuanzhang during his early difficult years, maintained a simple lifestyle after becoming empress, and often advised Zhu Yuanzhang, saving the lives of several ministers. After her death, the Hongwu Emperor vowed never to create another empress.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国皇帝，年号洪武，孝慈高皇后马氏的丈夫。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Ming Dynasty, with the reign name Hongwu, and the husband of Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 孝慈高皇后马氏的父亲，后被朱元璋追封为徐王。
description.en: Father of Empress Ma, posthumously enfeoffed as the Prince of Xu by Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 孝慈高皇后马氏的母亲，后被朱元璋追封为徐王夫人。
description.en: Mother of Empress Ma, posthumously titled the Princess Consort of Xu by Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 元末红巾军领袖之一，马皇后的义父，也是朱元璋早期的上级。
description.en: A leader of the Red Turban Rebellion in the late Yuan dynasty, the adoptive father of Empress Ma, and Zhu Yuanzhang's early superior.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋的嫡长子，被立为皇太子。正史记载为马皇后所生，但亦有说法称其生母为李淑妃。
description.en: The eldest son of the Hongwu Emperor, Zhu Yuanzhang, and was installed as the crown prince. Official histories record him as the son of Empress Ma, although some accounts suggest his birth mother was Consort Li.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋次子，封秦王。正史记载为马皇后所生。
description.en: The second son of the Hongwu Emperor, enfeoffed as the Prince of Qin. Official histories record him as the son of Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋三子，封晋王。正史记载为马皇后所生。
description.en: The third son of the Hongwu Emperor, enfeoffed as the Prince of Jin. Official histories record him as the son of Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第三位皇帝，明太祖朱元璋四子。其生母存在争议，正史记载为马皇后，但亦有说法称其生母为䂵妃。
description.en: The third emperor of the Ming Dynasty, the fourth son of the Hongwu Emperor. His birth mother is a subject of historical debate; official histories record her as Empress Ma, but other accounts suggest she was Consort Gong.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋五子，封周王。正史记载为马皇后所生。
description.en: The fifth son of the Hongwu Emperor, enfeoffed as the Prince of Zhou. Official histories record him as the son of Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋与马皇后之女。
description.en: Daughter of the Hongwu Emperor and Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋与马皇后之女。
description.en: Daughter of the Hongwu Emperor and Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 明初文学家、史学家，因受孙子牵连被判死罪，后因马皇后求情而得以赦免。
description.en: A writer and historian of the early Ming dynasty who was sentenced to death due to his grandson's involvement in a case, but was later pardoned due to Empress Ma's intercession.

description.zh-cn: 吴兴富民，因出资帮助修建都城并犒劳军队，触怒朱元璋，后因马皇后劝谏而免于一死。
description.en: A wealthy commoner from Wuxing who angered Zhu Yuanzhang by funding the construction of the capital city and rewarding the army, but was spared death due to Empress Ma's advice.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋的妃子，在马皇后去世后代掌后宫。有说法称她是朱标、朱樉、朱㭎的生母。
description.en: A consort of the Hongwu Emperor who managed the imperial harem after Empress Ma's death. Some sources claim she was the birth mother of Zhu Biao, Zhu Shuang, and Zhu Gang.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋的妃子，在马皇后去世后代掌后宫。
description.en: A consort of the Hongwu Emperor who managed the imperial harem after Empress Ma's death.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋的妃子。根据《南京太常寺志》等记载，她是明成祖朱棣的生母。
description.en: A consort of the Hongwu Emperor. According to records such as the 'Nanjing Taichang Si Zhi', she was the birth mother of the Yongle Emperor, Zhu Di.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗李世民的皇后，以贤德著称。朱元璋常将马皇后比作长孙皇后。
description.en: The empress consort of Emperor Taizong of Tang, known for her virtue and wisdom. Zhu Yuanzhang often compared Empress Ma to her.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第二位皇帝，朱标之子，朱元璋之孙。于洪武三十一年追尊祖母马皇后。
description.en: The second emperor of the Ming Dynasty, son of Zhu Biao and grandson of Zhu Yuanzhang. He posthumously honored his grandmother, Empress Ma, in the 31st year of the Hongwu era (1398).

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十一位皇帝，年号嘉靖。于嘉靖十七年再次为马皇后上尊谥。
description.en: The eleventh emperor of the Ming Dynasty, with the reign name Jiajing. He added to Empress Ma's posthumous title in the 17th year of the Jiajing era (1538).

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，由朱元璋建立。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history established by Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代地名，孝慈高皇后马氏的出生地。
description.en: An ancient place name in China, the birthplace of Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 明朝初期的首都，位于今天的南京，是孝慈高皇后马氏的逝世地。
description.en: The capital of the early Ming Dynasty, located in modern-day Nanjing, and the place where Empress Ma died.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋及其皇后马氏的合葬陵墓。
description.en: The joint mausoleum of the Hongwu Emperor, Zhu Yuanzhang, and his wife, Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 孝慈高皇后马氏是朱元璋的原配妻子。
description.en: Empress Ma was the primary consort of Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 马公将女儿马氏交托郭子兴抚养，马氏认郭子兴为义父。
description.en: Ma Gong entrusted his daughter, the future Empress Ma, to the care of Guo Zixing, and she regarded him as her adoptive father.

description.zh-cn: 郭子兴与马公是莫逆之交。
description.en: Guo Zixing and Ma Gong were very close friends.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋早年投奔郭子兴帐下效力。
description.en: In his early years, Zhu Yuanzhang joined and served under Guo Zixing.

description.zh-cn: 郭子兴曾听信谗言猜疑朱元璋。
description.en: Guo Zixing once believed slander and became suspicious of Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋于洪武元年正月初四登基当日，册封结发之妻马氏为皇后。
description.en: On the day of his accession, the fourth day of the first month of the first year of Hongwu (January 23, 1368), Zhu Yuanzhang created his wife, Lady Ma, as Empress.

description.zh-cn: 正史记载朱标为马皇后所生。
description.en: Official histories record Zhu Biao as the son of Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 正史记载朱樉为马皇后所生。
description.en: Official histories record Zhu Shuang as the son of Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 正史记载朱㭎为马皇后所生。
description.en: Official histories record Zhu Gang as the son of Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 正史记载朱棣为马皇后所生，但其生母存在争议。
description.en: Official histories record Zhu Di as the son of Empress Ma, but his birth mother is disputed.

description.zh-cn: 正史记载朱橚为马皇后所生。
description.en: Official histories record Zhu Su as the son of Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 马皇后为因孙子犯罪而被判死罪的宋濂求情，最终使其获得赦免。
description.en: Empress Ma interceded for Song Lian, who was sentenced to death due to his grandson's crime, ultimately securing his pardon.

description.zh-cn: 马皇后劝谏朱元璋，使因犒劳军队而触怒皇帝的富民沈秀免于一死。
description.en: Empress Ma advised Zhu Yuanzhang, sparing the wealthy commoner Shen Xiu from death after he angered the emperor by rewarding the army.

description.zh-cn: 孝慈高皇后马氏于洪武十五年九月葬于孝陵。
description.en: Empress Ma was buried in the Ming Xiaoling Mausoleum in the ninth month of the 15th year of the Hongwu era (September 1382).

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋常对群臣称赞马皇后贤慧，可与唐太宗时的长孙皇后相比。
description.en: Zhu Yuanzhang often praised Empress Ma's virtue and wisdom to his court officials, comparing her to Empress Zhangsun of Emperor Taizong of Tang.

description.zh-cn: 于洪武三十一年六月追尊祖母为“孝慈昭宪至仁文德承天顺圣高皇后”。
description.en: In the sixth month of the 31st year of the Hongwu era (June 1398), he posthumously honored his grandmother with the title 'Empress Xiaocizhaoxian Zhiren Wende Chengtian Shunsheng Gao'.

description.zh-cn: 于永乐十九年正月重尊母亲为“孝慈昭宪至仁文德承天顺圣高皇后”。
description.en: In the first month of the 19th year of the Yongle era (January 1421), he re-honored his mother with the title 'Empress Xiaocizhaoxian Zhiren Wende Chengtian Shunsheng Gao'.

description.zh-cn: 于嘉靖十七年再次为马皇后上尊谥为“孝慈贞化哲顺仁徽成天育圣至德高皇后”。
description.en: In the 17th year of the Jiajing era (1538), he again added to Empress Ma's posthumous title, making it 'Empress Xiaoci Zhenhua Zheshun Renhui Chengtian Yusheng Zhide Gao'.

description.zh-cn: 根据《南京太常寺志》等记载，其生母为李淑妃，而非马皇后。
description.en: According to records such as the 'Nanjing Taichang Si Zhi', his birth mother was Consort Li, not Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 根据《南京太常寺志》等记载，其生母为李淑妃，而非马皇后。
description.en: According to records such as the 'Nanjing Taichang Si Zhi', his birth mother was Consort Li, not Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 根据《南京太常寺志》等记载，其生母为李淑妃，而非马皇后。
description.en: According to records such as the 'Nanjing Taichang Si Zhi', his birth mother was Consort Li, not Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 根据《南京太常寺志》等记载，其生母为䂵妃，而非马皇后。
description.en: According to records such as the 'Nanjing Taichang Si Zhi', his birth mother was Consort Gong, not Empress Ma.
